actors.name: for user
actors.sentence:
INTRODUCTION
Purpose: to integrate 3 faculties' databases and provide a web interface for users to access and manage the integrated inventory
Scope: to provide a unified university inventory system (UUIS) with a web interface for users to access and manage inventory
Definitions:
- unified university inventory system (UUIS)
- technology-independent
- business terminology
SYSTEM OVERVIEW
Description: a web-based system for managing university inventory, including assets, locations, and user permissions
Features:
- asset management
- location management
- user permission management
- report generation
FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS
User Requirements:
- create requests
- edit assets
- modify assets
- add inventory assets
- create new locations
System Requirements:
- authenticate users
- authorize user actions
- update inventory
- generate reports
USE CASES
Actors:
- inventory admin
- users
- administrators
Descriptions:
- modify asset
- edit asset
- add new asset
- create request
- return asset
- approve request
- change permissions
